item.title: Changing PDF Orientation
item.description: Changing the orientation for the whole document PDFs knit in a portrait orientation by default. However, should you want to output a PDF in landscape mode, it has to be specified in the LaTeX arguments in the YAML header. --- title: "Landscape PDF" subtitle: "This demonstrates a landscape PDF output" output: pdf_document classoption: landscape --- This document is 8.5 inches tall and 11 inches wide. ** The code above produces this output**
